Container.Name: codimd
Container.Overview: Codimd gives you access to all your files wherever you are.[br][br]CodiMD is a real-time, multi-platform collaborative markdown note editor. This means that you can write notes with other people on your desktop, tablet or even on the phone. You can sign-in via multiple auth providers like Facebook, Twitter, GitHub and many more on the homepage.

Config.Name: Webui
Config.Description: If you wish to access this container from http://{IP}:{PORT} this must be left unchanged. If you intend to access from behind a reverse proxy, this can be changed safely. This is a limitation of the way CodiMD works.

Config.Name: DATABASE_TYPE
Config.Description: postgres or mysql are officially supported, however mariadb and sqlite will work, CodiMD may not support future upgrades from these.

Config.Name: DATABASE_HOST
Config.Description: URL or IP or container name (if using a custom network) of your database, ignored if using sqlite

Config.Name: DATABASE_PORT
Config.Description: Port number of your database, ignored if using sqlite

Config.Name: DATABASE_USER
Config.Description: Name of user to connect to the database, ignored if using sqlite

Config.Name: DATABASE_PASSWORD
Config.Description: Password of the above user, ignored if using sqlite

Config.Name: DOMAIN
Config.Description: Domain name for your reverse proxy. eg codimd.server.com
